landing.heroSubtitle: No more confusion. No more stress. Just you, your dreams, and a clear path to get there.
landing.universitiesTitle: Dream schools? We've got them all
landing.universitiesSubtitle: From Ivy League to hidden gems â€” explore universities that match your vibe
landing.featuresSubtitle: We've been there. We know how overwhelming it can be. That's why we built tools that actually help.
landing.feature1Desc: Browse 1,500+ universities. Filter by what matters to you â€” budget, location, programs, vibes. Your perfect match is out there.
landing.feature2Desc: Tell us about yourself, and our AI will suggest schools that actually make sense for you. No more guessing games.
landing.feature3Desc: Deadlines, documents, requirements â€” we keep track so you don't have to stress. Everything organized in one dashboard.
landing.feature4Desc: Discover what makes you unique. Write essays that actually sound like you. Our AI mentor is here 24/7.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Four steps. That's all it takes to go from 'where do I start?' to 'I got this!'
landing.step1Quote: I don't even know where to start...
landing.step1Desc: No worries! Just answer a few questions about your background, interests, and dreams. We'll take it from there.
landing.step2Quote: There are SO many schools... which one is right for me?
landing.step2Desc: Our AI crunches the numbers and finds schools that fit your profile, budget, and goals. Each recommendation comes with a match score and real insights.
landing.step3Quote: How do I keep track of all these deadlines?!
landing.step3Desc: We've got your back. Deadline reminders, document checklists, progress tracking â€” all in one place. No more spreadsheet chaos.
landing.step4Quote: My essay sounds so... boring. How do I make it special?
landing.step4Desc: Your story is unique â€” let's make sure it shines. Our AI mentor helps you craft essays that are authentically YOU. The kind admissions officers remember.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Thousands of students have already taken the first step. Ready to join them?

features.heroSubtitle: We built Leaply because we wished something like this existed when we were applying. Now it does.
features.exploreTagline: Your dream school is out there. Let's find it.
features.exploreDesc: 1,500+ universities at your fingertips. Search, filter, compare â€” and let our AI suggest schools you might not have even considered.
features.exploreBenefit1Desc: Budget tight? Want sunny weather? Need strong CS programs? Filter by what actually matters to you
features.exploreBenefit2Desc: Our AI learns your preferences and finds schools that truly fit â€” not just random suggestions
features.exploreBenefit3Desc: Put your top choices next to each other. See tuition, rankings, requirements â€” all in one view
features.applicationsTagline: Goodbye spreadsheet chaos. Hello peace of mind.
features.applicationsDesc: Multiple schools, dozens of deadlines, endless documents. Sound familiar? We organize everything so you can focus on what matters â€” your applications.
features.applicationsBenefit1Desc: One dashboard. All your applications. Every deadline. No surprises
features.applicationsBenefit2Desc: We'll ping you before deadlines. Early enough to actually do something about it
features.applicationsBenefit3Desc: Each school has different requirements. We track what you need and what you've done
features.personaLabTagline: Your story is unique. Let's make it shine.
features.personaLabDesc: Essays are hard. We get it. That's why we built a space where you can discover what makes you YOU â€” and turn it into essays that admissions officers actually want to read.
features.personaLabBenefit1Desc: 4 guided tracks help you uncover strengths, values, and stories you didn't know you had
features.personaLabBenefit2Desc: AI suggestions that sound like you, not like a robot. Edit, refine, make it yours
features.personaLabBenefit3Desc: Our AI mentor reads like a real person. Specific observations. Actionable suggestions. No fluff
features.additionalSubtitle: Because the little things matter too
features.benefit1Desc: We take privacy seriously. Your information stays yours
features.benefit2Desc: Connect with others who've been through it. Alumni, current students, fellow applicants
features.benefit3Desc: Requirements change. Rankings update. We keep our data current so you don't have to worry
features.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of students who chose the easier path. You deserve it too.

about.heroSubtitle: We're a team of Vietnamese students and recent grads who went through the study abroad process ourselves. We know how confusing it can be. That's why we built Leaply.
about.missionText: Applying to study abroad shouldn't feel like navigating a maze blindfolded. We remember the late nights googling, the anxiety over deadlines, the essays we rewrote a hundred times. We built Leaply to be the friend we wished we had â€” someone who actually gets it and can help you figure things out.
about.value1Desc: This isn't just a product to us. Every student who uses Leaply is someone we genuinely want to see succeed.
about.value2Desc: AI is powerful, but only when it serves real human needs. We build tech that actually helps, not just impresses.
about.value3Desc: Vietnamese students have unique challenges. We build for those, not for some generic 'international student'.
about.teamSubtitle: A small but mighty team of dreamers, builders, and former stressed-out applicants.
about.contactSubtitle: Got questions? Feedback? Just want to chat? We'd love to hear from you. Seriously, we read every message.
about.formSuccess: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.
about.ctaSubtitle: Your dream school is waiting. Let's make it happen together.

personaLab.title: Persona Lab
personaLab.subtitle: Discover yourself and prepare essays
personaLab.discoverySubtitle: Complete the tracks so Leaply can better understand your story
personaLab.question: Question
personaLab.whyImportantDesc: These questions help Leaply understand your unique story. From there, we can suggest interesting angles for essays and help you stand out in your study abroad application.
personaLab.myPersonaSubtitle: Insights about you analyzed by Leaply from Discovery
personaLab.completeDiscoveryForTags: Complete Discovery so Leaply can create personality tags for you
personaLab.storiesAppear: Your stories will appear here after completing Discovery
personaLab.completeOneTrack: Complete at least 1 track in Discovery to see your persona. Leaply will analyze your answers and create insights for you.
personaLab.selectFromList: Select an essay from the list on the left or create a new essay
personaLab.selectSchoolAndType: Select school and essay type to start writing
personaLab.startWriting:
Start writing your essay...

Tip: Write in your own words first, Leaply will help you improve later. Don't worry about perfection from the start.
personaLab.resetConfirmDescription: This will clear all your conversation data and start fresh. Your canvas data will be lost.
personaLab.conversationComplete: Conversation complete! Your persona is ready.

home.subtitle: Here's your journey
home.startDiscoveryDesc: Understand your strengths and story before choosing the right schools. Persona Lab will help you discover the amazing things about yourself.
home.addFirstTargetDesc: Discover schools that match your profile and start building your target school list.
